summary:
PlayerHome is a series of basic but well made homes essentially it's pretty rad.

Please read your description's if you are interested in finding a install instruction.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=5]PlayerHome: One Of Basic Homes[/size][/font]

Description:

PlayerHome is a series of basic but well made homes essentially it's pretty rad. You will get all the features you expect. This one in particular is the first one ever made, and it is a simple home location in Riverwood (south of Whiterun, for your convenience) with all features you have come to expect in [b]every single house[/b] mod.

Features:

*dragon landing points
*all basic features
*recommended with smim

Version info:

It is compatible with all Skyrim versions in all sympathy not every single one has been tested but it doesn't make since for it not to.

PAY ATTENTION:

PlayerHome mods are very very easy to install with the use of a Mod Organizer or Nexus Mod Manager respectively. Please use care if deleting manually.

Mod Made By FearTheMod & Pshahsab48 (beauty)
author: FeaRtheMoD
